Cloud Consistency: The US Government Cloud Computing Technology Roadmap
articles.Description: The National Institute of Standards and Technology (NIST) released its final version of the U.S. government Cloud Computing Technology Roadmap, Volumes I and II last week. The roadmap provides international guidelines, objectives and “Priority Action Plans” for cloud computing, with the hope of improving cybersecurity for the United States' critical infrastructure and individual organizations.
